subject: Cannot access billing portal
body: I keep getting a 403 error when I try to open the billing page. I've tried multiple browsers and clearing cache. Our contract renewal is due next week.

subject: App crashes on file upload
body: Every time I try to upload a CSV file larger than 10MB the app shows a white screen and the browser tab eventually dies. Console shows an out-of-memory error.

subject: Request: dark mode
body: Would love a dark mode option. Working late nights and the bright UI is hard on the eyes. Many of our team members have asked for this.

subject: Suspicious login from unknown IP
body: I received an alert that my account was accessed from an IP in a country I've never been to. I did not authorize this. Please investigate immediately.

subject: Double charged for last month
body: My credit card was charged twice for the June invoice. Amount: $499 each. Please refund the duplicate charge ASAP.

subject: API returns 500 on /users endpoint
body: Since this morning, our integration is broken. GET /users returns 500 Internal Server Error. Attached the response body and our request headers. This is blocking our production pipeline.

subject: Feature request: webhook support
body: We'd like to receive webhooks for ticket status changes so we can sync with our internal Jira board. Currently we poll the API every 5 minutes which is wasteful.

subject: Password reset email never arrives
body: Clicked 'forgot password' three times, checked spam folder, whitelisted your domain — still no email after 2 hours.

subject: Data export includes other tenant's data
body: I exported our organization's data and found records that belong to a completely different company. This is a serious data leak. Please treat this as urgent.

subject: Search is extremely slow
body: Searching for tickets takes over 30 seconds, sometimes it just times out. This started after last week's update. Makes the product unusable for our support team.

subject: Mobile app won't load dashboard
body: After updating to the latest version (3.2.1) the dashboard just spins forever on both iOS and Android. Other screens work fine.

subject: Need to downgrade plan
body: We're downsizing and would like to switch from Business to Free tier. The billing page doesn't seem to allow downgrades, only upgrades.

subject: SSO integration broken after IdP certificate rotation
body: We rotated our SAML IdP certificate yesterday and now none of our 200+ users can log in via SSO. We uploaded the new cert in your admin panel but it's still rejecting.

subject: Feature request: custom fields on tickets
body: We need to add custom metadata fields (e.g., 'region', 'product_line') to tickets for reporting purposes. Currently we jam them into the description which is messy.

subject: Notification emails going to spam
body: Multiple users report that ticket update notifications end up in their spam folder (Gmail and Outlook). This started about two weeks ago.

subject: Audit log shows unauthorized admin action
body: Our audit log shows a 'delete_all_users' action triggered by an account that shouldn't have admin privileges. We've disabled the account but need you to investigate how this was possible.

subject: CSV import fails silently
body: I imported a CSV with 500 contacts. The UI said 'Import successful' but only 217 showed up. No error messages or logs visible to me.

subject: Request: multi-language support
body: We have customers across LATAM and Europe. Would be great if the UI supported Spanish, Portuguese, and French. Even just for the customer-facing portal.

subject: Account locked after too many MFA attempts
body: My authenticator app got out of sync and now my account is completely locked. I can't even reach the 'unlock' page because it requires login. Catch-22.

subject: Billing invoice has wrong tax amount
body: Our June invoice shows 20% VAT but we're a US-based company and should be exempt. Last month's was correct. Please re-issue.

subject: Automated reports stopped running
body: We have a daily report scheduled at 6 AM UTC. It hasn't run for the past four days. No error notification was sent either.

subject: XSS vulnerability in comment field
body: I can inject a <script>alert('xss')</script> tag in the ticket comment field and it executes when another agent views it. This is a serious security issue.

subject: Need API rate limit increase
body: We're hitting the 100 req/min limit during peak hours. Our integration processes about 5000 tickets per day. Can we get the limit raised to 500 req/min?

subject: Drag and drop broken in Firefox
body: The kanban board drag-and-drop feature doesn't work at all in Firefox 126. Cards just snap back to their original position. Works fine in Chrome.

subject: Request: SLA tracking dashboard
body: We need a dashboard that shows SLA compliance metrics — first response time, resolution time, breached tickets. This is critical for our enterprise compliance reporting.
